name: Lamplighter (itch) (Ritttsu)
description:
This is a two-player co-op rogue-lite game we made at GameJam. The two magicians need to collect stones and deliver them to the lighthouse, trade the stones, gain magic power improving, and finally defeat the boss. 

The game requires one player to use the keyboard and mouse, and one player to use the gamepad.

There is still have some bugs on the Boss. So sorry about that (qwq).
